title: New: Pandercakes – Paint By Numbers EP
body:
Photo by [Brian Lumen](http://brianlumanphoto.com/)

[**Pandercakes**’](http://pandercakes.bandcamp.com/) debut EP, (as far as I can tell), has been sitting on a tab in my browser for around a week now. It’s been starring at me, judging me; basically it fucking sucks. What doesn’t suck however is the record; 4 tracks of catchy as hell Beach Boys-infected psychedelic pop, that focus on great pop-song writing rather than sound-exploration, yet manage to succeed in both departments.

In short, the record had ADHD, vocalists change without warning, glockenspiels fuck synths sonically and all with a haze like fuzz acting as some sort of a comfort blanket to the madness.

Yeah, I kind of liked it.
